Text: Konami Kukeiha Club:  "Konami Square Wave Club", referring to square waves used in chiptunes in the 1980s) is Konami's sound team.

Text: Konami Kukeiha Club:  It is often confused with 矩形波倶楽部 (Kukeiha Club), Konami's in-house band that has released albums consisting of their studio performances.
